citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at
11:15-11:45am on 13-APR-18.
Honked, knocked, called out loudly and left a message on the answering machine.
